content: linen stitch embroidered hand bag chicago yarn crawl 2025 the bag begins by using judy s magic cast on to create a seamless bottom it is the knit in the round using a long circular needle slightly undersized to add density to the fabric the embroidery stitch diagram included with the pattern instructions uses french knots roses and daisy stitches for embellishment you can opt for a different design or no design at all simple leather handles from cocoknits are easy to install and match the rustic look of the yarn we hope you enjoy the pattern and would love for you to share your wips and fos with us please reach out with any questions regarding pattern instructions this bag pattern is also available in a crochet version translated from knitting to crochet by crace cocking supplies needed 2 skeins retrosaria cobertor 50gr/ 150 yards each 32 - 36 circular needle size 10 us or size to obtain gauge yarn needle for weaving in ends and embroidery 14 leather handles from cocoknits glossary of abbreviations k1 knit sl1p slip one stitch purl wise gauge 17 stitches and 27 row to 4 square in linen stitch knit in the round linen stitch in the round cast on an odd number of stitches in the round row 1 k1 sl1p repeat these two stitches until the last stitch k1 and slip marker row 2 sl1p k1 repeat these two until the last stitch sl1p and slip marker repeat these two row in the round finished dimensions approximately 8 5 high x 10 25 wide embroidery if you plan to alter the bag dimensions set aside 20gr of yarn for embroidery before casting on it may be necessary to purchase extra yarn step one casting on if you haven t tried judy s magic cast on you re in for a treat it creates an invisible circular cast on ideal for socks or bags if you decide to adjust the size of the bag or use different yarn just be sure to cast on an odd number of stitches link to judy s magic cast on https //youtu be/1pmxrdz-cwo cast on 83 stitches using jmco proceed to knit in the linen stitch in the round starting with the first row place a marker at the beginning of the round knit in the linen stitch until the piece measures just under 8 5 inches bind off in pattern and weave in ends steam block before adding embroidery embroidery instructions and diagram begin with the largest element first the daisy the center of will be approximately 3 5 inches from the left side and bottom of the bag link to french knot tutorial https //youtu be/pji5yo656u4 create a circle of french knots that measures approximately 1 25 in diameter create petals radiating from the edge of the french knot center using the lazy daisy stitch link to the lazy daisy stitch tutorial can be found here https //youtu be/sm5gpowy0yo stitch 5 rosettes of slightly
